thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Argentina says February tax collection up 37.7 pct yr/yr

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Argentina says February tax collection up 37.7 pct yr/yr
text:
BUENOS AIRES, March 2 (Reuters) - Argentina’s tax revenue surged 37.7 percent in February compared with the same month last year to 235.666 billion pesos ($11.7 billion), the country’s AFIP tax collection agency said on Friday.
Including extraordinary revenues in February 2017 due to fees collected as part of Argentina’s tax amnesty program, the year-on-year increase was 36.8 percent, AFIP said.
$1=20.12 Argentine pesos as of Feb. 28 Reporting by Luc Cohen
